faq.question: What are you looking for in your applicants?
faq.answer: The admissions team is looking for talented, highly-motivated students who are interested in attending the program because they have a passion for learning and problem-solving and wish to enrich their knowledge of programming and entrepreneurship to solve real world problems.

faq.question: I am a senior. Can I still participate this summer?
faq.answer: Yes, you can still qualify and participate the summer between your high school and college.

faq.question: When will I be notified of an admission decision?
faq.answer: It normally takes two to three weeks to receive a decision after all application materials have been received.

faq.question: Will participating in this program help me get into Cornell University?
faq.answer: Like any exceptional, extracurricular activity, participation in this summer program can help you present yourself as a strong candidate in your college applications. Further, you can potentially submit a copy of the evaluation letter you receive from your instructors upon completion of the program as a supplement to your college application.

faq.question: Where are classes held?
faq.answer: Classes and workshops are held online, you can watch the courses from the comfort of your home or anywhere in the world.

faq.question: Who teaches the classes?
faq.answer: Classes in over a dozen subjects and workshops are taught and lead by company founders, young professionals and Cornell students with direct entrepreneurial experience and applicable knowledge.

faq.question: How much do class materials cost?
faq.answer: All your need is a laptop or desktop. All other class materials will be provided to you!
